documents.content: Neo4j is a highly scalable native graph database that leverages data relationships as first-class entities. It provides ACID transactions, advanced graph algorithms, and a powerful query language called Cypher.

Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) combines the power of retrieval systems with generative AI models. It retrieves relevant context from a knowledge base and uses it to generate accurate, contextually grounded responses.

BitNet B1.58 achieves remarkable efficiency with 1.58-bit quantization, reducing memory usage by 87% and energy consumption by 96% compared to full-precision models, while maintaining comparable accuracy.
Azure Container Apps provides a serverless platform for running containerized applications. It offers automatic scaling, built-in authentication, and seamless integration with other Azure services.

Graph-based RAG systems leverage the relationships between documents and concepts to provide more accurate and contextually relevant answers. They excel at multi-hop reasoning and complex query resolution.
